001package beginner;

004
005import static com.sandwich.util.Assert.fail;
006
007public class AboutKoans {
008
009    @Koan
010    public void findAboutKoansFile() {
011    }
012
013    @Koan
014    public void definitionOfKoanCompletion() {
015        boolean koanIsComplete = true;
016        if (!koanIsComplete) {
017            fail("what if koanIsComplete variable was true?");
018        }
019    }
020
021}
